Desc.entry: Through co-ordinators, Sheffield City Council recruits and supports a network of older people who use their experience and views to help monitor, design and evaluate services to make sure they reflect the needs of older people. Anyone aged 50 years and over is welcome to join, make their opinion known as well as make friends.

ContactName.entry: Karen Dale/Janet Jones, Expert Elder Co-ordinators

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Every 6 weeks (meeting with speakers on a variety of subjects chosen by attenders, lunch provided)
